mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_profile ( iuser, img ) VALUES ( #{iuser}, #{img} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.iuser , A.email , A.nm , A.tel , A.mainProfile , A.regdt , IFNULL(B.cntFeed,0) AS cntFeed , IFNULL(C.cntFollow,0) AS cntFollow , IFNULL(D.cntFollower,0) AS cntFollower FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT iuser , COUNT(ifeed) AS cntFeed FROM t_feed WHERE iuser = ${iuser} ) B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN ( SELECT iuserMe , COUNT(iuserMe) AS cntFollow FROM t_user_follow WHERE iuserMe = ${iuser} ) C ON A.iuser = C.iuserMe LEFT JOIN ( SELECT iuserYou , COUNT(iuserYou) AS cntFollower FROM t_user_follow WHERE iuserYou = ${iuser} ) D ON A.iuser = D.iuserYou WHERE A.iuser = ${iuser};
